widgets_values: Low contrast. Pegasus pony Rainbow Dash from My Little Pony sitting sunbathing in a sun beam in a forest by a lake. The wind is blowing through the trees and her mane. Water ripples in the pond.

nodes.title: Switch - True is Generated,  False is Static

widgets_values:
Not guaranteed to work. I updated this from WAN 2.1 to 2.2, but while 5B worked, it didn't give particularly good output, and 14B was giving me OOM errors.

I'll revisit this, and if anyone wants to let me know either that it works for them, or give changes to improve it, I'm open to them. (Though I don't add custom nodes other then my own in example workflows, so if it can't be done with my nodes or core, it might be more a matter of my adding functionality.)
